channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 总部位于圣迭戈的初创公司 ZeaKal 表示，它已开发出一种含油量更高的玉米新品种，希望借此抓住可再生能源需求激增的机遇。
item.description:
ZeaKal said it has developed a new variety of corn with higher levels of oil as the San Diego-based startup seeks to capitalize on a boom in demand for renewable energy. https://t.co/AIMogpcovT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 在数千名受害者向荷兰法院起诉淡水河谷公司之后，淡水河谷公司将因 2015 年巴西大坝溃坝事故而面临新的法律诉讼。
item.description:
Vale is set to face a fresh legal front over a catastrophic Brazilian dam collapse in 2015 after thousands of victims sued the company in a Dutch court. https://t.co/2gboKS5LIj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 陶氏表示，欧洲的电价如此之高，以至于该化学公司的一些工业客户的长期前景堪忧
item.description:
Dow says the price of electricity in Europe is so high that there are doubts about the long-term future of some of the chemical company’s industrial customers https://t.co/cTsw8oAU5s

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 华尔街的策略师们对美国股市的飞速上涨是否涨得过快、过猛存在很大分歧，甚至连美国银行自己也不同意这一观点。
item.description:
Strategists on Wall Street are so divided on if the meteoric rise of the US stock market has risen too far, too fast that even Bank of America's own disagree https://t.co/JLy2SOaEyG

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 对威托尔公司前交易员进行的具有里程碑意义的审判，前所未有地揭露了全球大宗商品交易行业的不法行为
item.description:
The landmark trial of a former Vitol trader has shone an unprecedented light on wrongdoing in the global commodity trading industry https://t.co/0O5Vy6NyV6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: BAE 系统公司将出售投资级债券，为其 56 亿美元收购 Ball Aerospace 公司提供资金支持。
item.description:
BAE Systems is selling investment-grade bonds to help finance its $5.6-billion purchase of Ball Aerospace https://t.co/4JkHtiYbsj

item.title: 当 Reddit 本周在纽约证券交易所上市时，它的命运将部分掌握在我们熟悉的手中：它的用户们
item.description:
When Reddit lists on the New York Stock Exchange this week, its fate will rest, in part, in familiar hands: those of its users https://t.co/1XJjae7kYq

item.description:
Congress shouldn’t single out TikTok when data privacy is a bigger issue, critics say https://t.co/eJBlQDWci9

item.title: 加拿大 2 月份通胀率意外下降，这是自 2021 年初以来连续第二个月通胀率低于 3%。以下是经济学家和策略师的观点
item.description:
Canadian inflation unexpectedly eased in February, the second straight month of sub-3% inflation since early 2021. Here’s what economists and strategists had to say https://t.co/5pJPxp7p52

item.title: 英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）沉重地暗示政府正在考虑于 10 月举行大选
item.description:

item.title: 意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼表示，意大利反对对乌克兰进行任何形式的直接军事干预
item.description:
Italy is against any kind of direct military intervention in Ukraine, says Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni https://t.co/hd8ZcrDD3g

item.title: 雪佛龙公司首席执行官迈克-沃思（Mike Wirth）说，几周前，雪佛龙公司与埃克森公司和中国中核集团（Cnooc）就圭亚那海岸附近的多产油田进行的讨论 "突然 "结束。
item.description:
Chevron’s discussions with Exxon and China’s Cnooc over a prolific oil field off the shores of Guyana ended “abruptly” a few weeks ago, CEO Mike Wirth said. https://t.co/fgYyN63Ito

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: -日本央行17年来首次加息-风险偏好创2021年以来新高-比特币远未分裂@ManusCranny报道。敬请收听美国东部时间凌晨 5 点的 "彭博简报
item.description:
-Bank of Japan raised rates for the first time in 17 years
-Risk appetite is the highest since 2021
-Bitcoin is far from split@ManusCranny reports. Tune into "Bloomberg Brief" at 5am ET https://t.co/b9KGC2awUf pic.twitter.com/oE4i8WAhwl

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 一名联邦法官签署了破产加密公司 Genesis Global Capital 与美国证券交易委员会（SEC）的和解协议，该公司被指控其帮助运营的数字资产借贷项目违反了该机构的规定。
item.description:
A federal judge signed off on bankrupt crypto firm Genesis Global Capital’s settlement with the SEC over allegations a digital-asset lending program it helped run violated the agency’s rules. https://t.co/v1Qmo7VYa1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 涉嫌 6 亿美元镍矿欺诈案的中心商人正竭力支付 33 万英镑的律师费
item.description:
The businessman at the center of an alleged $600 million nickel fraud is struggling to pay £330,000 in legal fees https://t.co/8YcQL44zlr

item.title: 肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）将向浸信会健康中心的迈阿密神经科学研究所捐赠5,000万美元，这是他本月第二次向该市的医疗机构捐赠如此巨额的资金。
item.description:
Ken Griffin is making a $50 million donation to the Miami Neuroscience Institute at Baptist Health — his second gift of that size this month to a health-care facility in the city. https://t.co/d2taQpSs5V

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 据知情人士透露，中国人寿正在与金丝雀码头一座办公楼的贷款人进行紧张谈判，以帮助避免该地区第三起潜在的重大违约事件。
item.description:
China Life is in crunch talks with lenders to an office tower in Canary Wharf to help stave off the locality’s third potential major default, sources say https://t.co/EoYcErx2MV

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 英国农民计划将拖拉机开到伦敦市中心，抗议不合格食品进口等问题
item.description:

item.title: 摩洛哥听从国际货币基金组织（IMF）关于谨慎行事的建议，在另一个季度维持利率不变

item.title: 今天彭博社绿色雷达上有什么？美国国家气象局表示，周三即将到来的干燥大风引发了中西部和中大西洋部分地区的火灾天气警报，包括华盛顿、里士满和巴尔的摩。
item.description:
What's on Bloomberg Green's radar today? Gusty, dry winds set to arrive Wednesday have sparked fire weather watch across parts of the Midwest and Mid Atlantic, including Washington, Richmond and Baltimore, the National Weather Service said https://t.co/pbedTKjJez

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 西门子表示，其关键数字产业在中国的需求疲软，跌幅为七个月来最大
item.description:
Siemens fell the most in seven months after flagging that its key digital industries is seeing only muted demand in China https://t.co/JT9kKhgREZ
